headline: Will New Institutional Interest in NextEra Energy (NEE) Reshape the Growth Narrative for This Utility Leader?
summary: NextEra Energy, Inc., parent company of Florida Power & Light, recently presented at the EEI Financial Conference in Hollywood, Florida, drawing investor interest amid upward revisions to earnings estimates and continued operational outperformance. An interesting point is that institutional investment managers have increased exposure to the company, citing its rate-regulated utility business and growth in renewables despite changing federal subsidy support. We’ll explore how rising investor...
